facts.construction quality: 8.0 provided by the county assessor, this grade is based on a scale that varies by market. for more information, or to update the grade, contact the county assessor's office.

title: Santa Clara Home For Sale
description: For sale: $1,088,000. Fantastic home in desirable Santa Clara neighborhood. Beautifully remodeled and expanded with permits 2 yrs ago. Open floor plan flooded w/natural light. Kitchen w/granite counters, double sinks and stainless steel appliances. Large bedrooms, inside laundry, central A/C, tankless instant water heater, double pane windows, copper plumbing, gas fireplace.Low SC utilities.Huge landscaped private backyard. Walk to schools and shopping center. About 2.5 miles to new Apple campus and Kaiser. Approved plans for guest uni
